text: Krrish is a 2006 Hindi-language superhero film directed, produced, and written by Rakesh Roshan. Hrithik Roshan and Priyanka Chopra are the lead roles. Naseeruddin Shah, Rekha, Manini Mishra, Archana Puran Singh and Sharat Saxena are in the supporting roles. This movie is a sequel to Koi... Mil Gaya. The film had a global release on June 23, 2006. It received positive reviews and went on to become a blockbuster. It was the third highest-grossing Indian film of the year. The movie followed with Krrish 3 in 2013. Also, in 2013, Toonz Animation India produced a Indian animated television film series of 4 Indian animated films that are also a part of the Krrish franchise.. They focus on the adventures on the kid version of Krrish, which is why it is called Kid Krrish. A fourth sequel to this film titled Krrish 4 is also in development, which will be released on December 30, 2022. ==Plot== A young man named Krrish has inherited supernatural powers thanks to his father's encounter with an alien. == Cast == * Hrithik Roshan as Krishna "Krrish" Mehra / Dr. Rohit Mehra (Double Role) * Priyanka Chopra as Priya Kalyanan * Naseeruddin Shah as Dr. Siddhant Arya * Rekha as Sonia Mehra * Manini Mishra as Honey Arora * Sharat Saxena as Dr. Vikram Sinha * Archana Puran Singh as Nayantara * Bin Xia as Kristian Li / Krrish * Hemant Pandey as Bahadur * Puneet Issar as Komal Singh * Akash Khurana as Father * Kiran Juneja as Amisha Kalyanan * Yu Xuan as Kristian's Sister * Preity Zinta as Nisha Mehra (Special Appearance) * Rakesh Roshan as Dr. Sanjay Mehra (Special Appearance) == References == Category:2000s Hindi-language movies Category:2000s Indian movies Category:Movies directed by Rakesh Roshan
